scriptmanager.scripts.BAM_Statistics

Class PEStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.BAM_Statistics.PEStats

  • public class PEStats
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for generating Insert-size Histogram statistics (GEO requirement) and alignment statistics and parameters given a sorted and indexed (BAI) paired-end BAM File.
    Author:
    Olivia Lang
    See Also:
    PEStatsCLI, PEStatWindow, PEStatWindow

    • Method Detail

      • getPEStats

        public static java.util.Vector<org.jfree.chart.ChartPanel> getPEStats(java.io.File out_basename,
                                                                      java.io.File bamFile,
                                                                      boolean DUP_STATUS,
                                                                      int MIN_INSERT,
                                                                      int MAX_INSERT,
                                                                      java.io.PrintStream PS_INSERT,
                                                                      java.io.PrintStream PS_DUP,
                                                                      boolean SUM_STATUS)
        Creates Insert-size Histograms and print alignment statistics to window and output file (if provided)
        Parameters:
        out_basename - Name of output file (without extensions)
        bamFile - BAM file to be analyzed
        DUP_STATUS - Boolean specifying if duplication statistics and chart should be generated
        MIN_INSERT - Maximum histogram range
        MAX_INSERT - Minimum histogram range
        PS_INSERT - PrintStream for insert statistics (should be null)
        PS_DUP - PrintStream for duplication statistics (should be null)
        SUM_STATUS - Boolean specifying if an insert summary should be generated
        Returns:

      • getMedian

        public static double getMedian(double[] histogram,
                               int MIN_INSERT,
                               int MAX_INSERT)
        Returns the median value of values a histogram
        Parameters:
        histogram - Histogram to be analyzed
        MIN_INSERT - Minimum range of histogram
        MAX_INSERT - Maximum range of histogram
        Returns:
        the median value of values in the histogram

      • getStdDev

        public static double getStdDev(double[] histogram,
                               double avg,
                               int MIN_INSERT,
                               int MAX_INSERT)
        Returns the standard deviation for a histogram
        Parameters:
        histogram - Histogram to be analyzed
        avg - Average of values in the histogram
        MIN_INSERT - Minimum range of histogram
        MAX_INSERT - Maximum range of histogram
        Returns:
        The standard deviation for the histogram

        public static int getBinIndex(int COUNT)
        Returns the correct X-value for the Pair-End Duplication Rate plot
        Parameters:
        COUNT - Frequency of duplications
        Returns:
        The index/X-value for a given amount of duplications
